name: Ace & Newgate
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may reveal 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" from your hand: Draw 1 card and place the revealed card at the top of your deck.

name: Ace & Newgate (Parallel)
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may reveal 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" from your hand: Draw 1 card and place the revealed card at the top of your deck.

name: Izo
effect:
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" other than [Izo] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash this Character: Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand at the bottom of your deck.

name: Izo (Parallel)
effect:
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" other than [Izo] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash this Character: Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand at the bottom of your deck.

name: Edward.Newgate
effect:
[Double Attack] (This card deals 2 damage.)
[On Play] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", draw 2 cards.

name: Edward.Newgate (Parallel)
effect:
[Double Attack] (This card deals 2 damage.)
[On Play] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", draw 2 cards.

name: Kouzuki Oden
effect:
If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may trash 2 cards from your hand instead.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards and return 1 of your Characters other than this Character to the owner's hand: Set this Character as active.

name: Kouzuki Oden (Parallel)
effect:
If this Character would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may trash 2 cards from your hand instead.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards and return 1 of your Characters other than this Character to the owner's hand: Set this Character as active.

name: Jozu
effect: [On Play] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Jozu (Parallel)
effect: [On Play] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Squard
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

name: Squard (Parallel)
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

name: Vista
effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

name: Vista (Parallel)
effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

name: Whitey Bay
effect: [Your Turn] [On Play] Up to 1 of your Leader with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" gains +2000 power during this turn.

name: Whitey Bay (Parallel)
effect: [Your Turn] [On Play] Up to 1 of your Leader with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" gains +2000 power during this turn.

name: Marco
effect:
[Once Per Turn] If this Character would be K.O.'d by your opponent's effect, you may trash 1 card from your hand instead.
[When Attacking] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", this Character gains +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Marco (Parallel)
effect:
[Once Per Turn] If this Character would be K.O.'d by your opponent's effect, you may trash 1 card from your hand instead.
[When Attacking] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", this Character gains +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: I Am Whitebeard!!
effect: [Main] If your Leader's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", play up to 1 [Edward.Newgate] from your hand. Then, you may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand. If you do, up to 1 of your Leader gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Take That Back!! Take Back What You Said!!
effect:
[Counter] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If that card's type includes "Whitebeard Pirates", up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
[Trigger] Draw 1 card.

name: Fire Fist
effect:
[Main] You may reveal 2 cards with a type including "Whitebeard Pirates" from your hand: Draw 1 card. Then, place up to 1 Character with a cost of 5 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.
[Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less to the owner's hand.
